text.subtitle: Hey, I’m
text.title: Инглишь мазафака
text.description:
I have been doing frontend development since 2019. I live and work in Moscow.
For several years of training and work in the field of web development, I managed to gain a multifaceted experience in more than 3 companies.

On this site you can find more information about me, my projects, as well as the technology stack that I work with.

about.title: I'll tell you a little about myself:
description: I work as a Frontend developer. In my free time, I improve in web development.
In the field of Frontend development began to develop in 2019. I was engaged in self-study, and also took courses at different sites (Stepik, Skillbox, Youtube).

In 2021, he started working as an HTML coder. I was engaged in layout of landing pages according to layouts, made all sorts of edits to existing projects. In parallel, I studied JavaScript, Vue to move into the field of web development
In 2022, he was certified and moved to the position of Frontend developer
In the second half of 2022, I moved to work as a Frontend developer at KСK TECHNOLOGIES, where I currently work.
Vue 2/3, Vue-router, Axios, Vuex, Nuxt, SCSS
The goal is to master in 2023:
Vue 3 composition api, Pinia, TypeScript, Nuxt 3

experience.name: HTML coder
duties: Layout of landing pages by layouts
